sense.gloss: to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to see, to get, to follow
to become clear, to be known, to be discovered, to be realized, to be realised, to be found out
I know!, I think so too!
cancellation, liquidation, resolution, reduction (e.g. of stress)
release, unleashing, liberation, emancipation, setting free
termination (of a contract), cancellation, rescinding, rescission
lifting (of a ban, sanctions, etc.), removal, release (from obligations), cancellation (of a warning, alert, etc.), calling off (e.g. a strike), releasing (a lock)
elucidation, explication, explaining, unravelling, clarification, understanding
correct answer, right solution, correct interpretation
right decision, right choice, appropriate judgement
breaking up (a meeting, gathering, etc.), dispersal (e.g. of a crowd)
dissolution (of a company, organization, etc.), winding-up, disbandment, split-up
dismissal (of an employee), discharge, firing, layoff
disassembly, dismantling, disaggregating, taking apart, breaking up, analysis, parsing
demolition, taking down, dismantling, disassembly, taking apart
dissolution (of an organization, company, etc.), breaking up
reconciliation, amicable settlement, accommodation, compromise, mediation, rapprochement
translation of a foreign language into Japanese
to untie, to unfasten, to unwrap, to undo, to unbind, to unpack
to solve, to work out, to answer
to dispel (misunderstanding, etc.), to clear up, to remove (suspicion), to appease
to dissolve (a contract), to cancel, to remove (a prohibition), to lift (a ban), to raise (a siege)
to release (from duty), to relieve, to dismiss
to comb (out), to card, to untangle (hair)
to undo, to untie, to unfasten, to unlace, to unravel, to loosen, to unpack
lifting a ban, raising an embargo, opening a season (hunting, fishing, etc.)
resolution (of a display, printer, scanner, etc.)
incomprehensible, mysterious, inexplicable, inscrutable, enigmatic, baffling
to be solved, to be resolved
to loosen, to come untied, to come undone
to be removed (of restrictions), to be lifted (e.g. a ban), to be broken (spells, curses, etc.)
to dissipate (of anger, tension, etc.), to melt away, to ease, to be appeased, to be resolved (of a dispute, misunderstanding, etc.), to be cleared up
to come loose, to come untied, to come undone, to unravel
explanation (e.g. for one's actions), excuse, justification, defense, defence
liberation from earthly desires and the woes of man, deliverance of one's soul, moksha, mukti, vimukti
solution (of an equation, inequality, etc.), root (e.g. of a polynomial)
to read and understand, to interpret (e.g. a difficult text), to read deeply, to read carefully, to analyze
to melt, to thaw, to fuse

sdata.j: ↑答↑↓こた↓えが↑分↑↓わ↓かったんだ、でもあまりにすぐに↑分↑↓わ↓かったものだから↑正解↑↓せいかい↓であるはずがないんだ。
sdata.e: I found a solution, but I found it so fast that it can't be the right solution.

sdata.j: うまく↑言↑↓い↓えないんだけど・・・↑自分↑↓じぶん↓も↑理解↑↓りかい↓していないことを↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓しようとしてるんだ。
sdata.e: I'm so dumb... I'm trying to explain things to you that I don't understand myself.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓くこと、↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓に↑思↑↓おも↓うことは↑理解↑↓りかい↓し↑始↑↓はじ↓めるということなんだ。
sdata.e: To be surprised, to wonder, is to begin to understand.

sdata.j: ↑誤解↑↓ごかい↓され↑得↑↓え↓るものはいずれすべて↑誤解↑↓ごかい↓されるであろう。
sdata.e: Anything that can be misunderstood will be.

sdata.j: ↑賢明↑↓けんめい↓さを↑理解↑↓りかい↓するには↑賢明↑↓けんめい↓でなければならない。↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓は↑聴衆↑↓ちょうしゅう↓がろう↑者↑↓しゃ↓では↑意味↑↓いみ↓がないのと↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に。
sdata.e: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf.

sdata.j: ハロー、↑問題↑↓もんだい↓が↑解決↑↓かいけつ↓したよ。↑以上↑↓いじょう↓お↑知↑↓し↓らせでした。
sdata.e: Hi, I just wanted to let you know that the problem is fixed.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑頭↑↓あたま↓がよいからその↑難問↑↓なんもん↓も↑解↑↓と↓けないはずはない。
sdata.e: You are too clever not to solve the hard problem.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑誤解↑↓ごかい↓している。
sdata.e: You do me wrong.

sdata.j: それは↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑対↑↓たい↓する↑誤解↑↓ごかい↓ですよ。
sdata.e: You do me wrong.

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓で↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑理解↑↓りかい↓してもらうことができますか。
sdata.e: Can you make yourself understood in English?

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓で↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことを↑相手↑↓あいて↓に↑理解↑↓りかい↓させられますか。
sdata.e: Can you make yourself understood in English?

sdata.j: ↑英語↑↓えいご↓であなたの↑言↑↓い↓うことを↑理解↑↓りかい↓させることができますか。
sdata.e: Can you make yourself understood in English?

sdata.j: あなたは↑英語↑↓えいご↓で↑相手↑↓あいて↓に↑理解↑↓りかい↓してもらえますか。
sdata.e: Can you make yourself understood in English?

sdata.j: あなたは↑英語↑↓えいご↓で↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓が↑理解↑↓りかい↓されるようにすることができますか。
sdata.e: Can you make yourself understood in English?

sdata.j: あなたは↑英語↑↓えいご↓で↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことを↑理解↑↓りかい↓してもらえますか。
sdata.e: Can you make yourself understood in English?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑解↑↓と↓いたのですか。
sdata.e: Have you solved all the problems yet?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑解↑↓と↓くことができましたか。
sdata.e: Could you solve the problem?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑意味↑↓いみ↓が↑容易↑↓ようい↓に↑理解↑↓りかい↓できますか。
sdata.e: Can you make out the meaning easily?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はこの↑詩↑↓し↓が↑理解↑↓りかい↓できるかい。
sdata.e: Can you make sense of this poem?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はこの↑一説↑↓いっせつ↓の↑意味↑↓いみ↓が↑理解↑↓りかい↓できますか。
sdata.e: Can you get at the meaning of this passage?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓は↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓に↑理解↑↓りかい↓している。
sdata.e: I understand your position perfectly.

sdata.j: あなたの↑解答↑↓かいとう↓を↑先生↑↓せんせい↓のと↑比↑↓くら↓べてみなさい。
sdata.e: Compare your answers with the teacher's.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑解答↑↓かいとう↓は↑完璧↑↓かんぺき↓からは↑程遠↑↓ほどとお↓い。
sdata.e: Your answer is anything but perfect.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑行動↑↓こうどう↓に↑弁解↑↓べんかい↓の↑余地↑↓よち↓はない。
sdata.e: Your behavior admits of no excuse.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓ったことを↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓が↑理解↑↓りかい↓したはずはない。
sdata.e: She cannot have understood what you said.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことは↑全↑↓まった↓く↑理解↑↓りかい↓することができない。
sdata.e: I can not make out at all what you say.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のこの↑忠告↑↓ちゅうこく↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓の↑解決↑↓かいけつ↓に↑大↑↓おお↓いに↑役立↑↓やくだ↓つだろう。
sdata.e: This advice of yours will go a long way toward solving the problem.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑問題↑↓もんだい↓を↑解↑↓と↓く↑容易↑↓たやす↓さには↑驚↑↓おどろ↓くぜ。
sdata.e: I'm amazed by the ease with which you solve the problem.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑助↑↓たす↓けてくれたおかげで、その↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓に↑理解↑↓りかい↓できた。
sdata.e: Thanks to your help, I could understand the book quite well.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑言↑↓い↓わんとする↑事↑↓こと↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓には↑理解↑↓りかい↓できない。
sdata.e: Your meaning is beyond me.
